response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that I believe would greatly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its intrinsic value and potential impact, I understand its worth to you stands at $800,000. After careful consideration, I propose to offer this exceptional product to you at a price of $1,200,000. This offer aims to strike a balance between maximizing the return on my investment and ensuring you receive a fair deal that meets your expectations. I look forward to discussing the details and understanding your thoughts on this proposal. Thank you for considering this opportunity.", "product_price": 1200000}
